titleStmt.title: The rapparee saint a funeral sermon upon the death of Monsieur St. Ruth, preached at Gallaway, a little after the late fight / by Mac Olero ... ; to which is added St. Ruth's last speech to the Irish army.
titleStmt.author: Mac Olero.
St. Ruth, Charles Chalmont, marquis de, d. 1691.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed at London, and reprinted at Edinburgh,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in National Library of Scotland (Advocates').
